original_text:
Every valley shall be filled in,
    every mountain and hill made low.
The crooked roads shall become straight,
    the rough ways smooth.
korean_text: 모든 골짜기가 메워지고 모든 산과 작은 산이 낮아지고 굽은 것이 곧아지고 험한 길이 평탄하여질 것이요

sentences.original_text: Every valley shall be filled in
every mountain and hill made low
The crooked roads shall become straight
